ALSADO APP

All Social Media Status Free Downloader Android App.

Download App

Alsado Android APK

Alsado is an Android App that will help you download the Social Media Status of all Account.

Download From Samsung Galaxy Store : Download App
Download From Apkpure : Download

Why Alsado ?

ALSADO is completely free that is you don't have to pay anything, and you can download the status of even private social media accounts without any hassle. Alsado also Allows you to download the story and status of even private accounts on Instagram.

How to Use ALSADO Android APK APP

It is so simple, well all you have to do is to open the app and select the Social Media from where you need to download the status and as soon as you click it. You will see all the status or story of the account that you have been following



How to Install ALSADO Android APK APP

Step 1 : Download the App Either from Apkpure or from Samsung Galaxy Store if you are a Samsung Mobile User.
Step 2 : Now Install the Application.
Step 3 : Sometimes you will have to make sure to Allow installation of Application from Unknown Sources in Order to Install the Android Apk on your Mobile.
Step 4 : There you are. Done !! Open the App and Start to Download the Status Of Your Friends.
